data.title: Life Is Beautiful...
data.text:
Prosonggo Singur

Singur e TATA-der Nano project niye WB dwidhabibhokto! jokhon prothom Singur andolon shuru holo, Dec'2006, tokhoni dekhechi chashira charao WB-er anek shilpi sahityik rajyer birodhi netrir pashe dariyeche ba alada bhabe pothe nemeche. kintu Singur e Nano Project tar agei churanto hoye geche. TATA ke ghire , SINGUR ke ghire WB-er manush , shasok dol swapno dekhte shuru koreche. TATA desher agroni ebong sobcheye punoro shilpo songsha. TATA ra nijer munafar cheyeo samajik agrogoti keo sob jayegaye pradhanyo deye. sei orthe TATA gosthi emon ek shilpo gosthi, jara samajik swartho rokkha kore thake. tahole golmaal ta kothay? keno ei andolon? keno kolkatar shikhito somajer ek ongsho support korche na nano project? birodhi pokkher katha chere dilam , tara poriskar rajnoitik fayeda tulte chaiche. eksomoy shasok pokkho je hatiyar niye gram banglaye doliyo potaka pNutechilo, aj aabar gram er manush i birodhi doler prodhan osthro. thik boomerang er moto!

kintu shoher shikkhito manush? tara keno nandigram-singur niye pothe name? tara ki jane na juge juge shilpo karkhana toiri hoyeche abadi jomir oporei. karon abadi jomirke ghire manusher bosobas, sekhane joler sandhan paoya jaye, somotol bistirno jomi paoya jaye. sundorboner jongole, puruliyar pathure bhumi te ba darjeeling r pahare jemon krishi hoye na, shilpo-o hobe na. Noida , Gurgaon teo age chashbas hoto. aj desher leading induatrial area. Industry hole service sector / IT/ Banking etc o develop korbe. net fol desher unnoti. kintu......ekhaneo ekta kintu thekei jaye. r tai bodhhoy dwidhagrostho amader moto anek manush, jader kono rajnoitik ambition nei, tobu 100% mon theke mene nite parchi na TATA der Nano Project e sarkar-er obosthan. aabar aj TATA ra WB chere chole jacche shuneo churanto hotash!!

400 ekar jomi jara dite chaiche na jani na tara kotojon unnayon bojhe, desher swartho bojhe, tader swartho-tyag tader bhobishyot projonmo ke anekta egiye dite pare....ei somikoron bojhe! tara oshikkhito, ordho-shikkhito. tader niyeii politics kore desher choto-boro sab netara. Ei shilpayane tader ki labh? je jomi te TATA ra 1500 koti tata dhale, sei jomir jonne ek ek jon krisok 8 lakh taka pabe???? ekta krisok poribare kotojon sodoshyo hoy amader deshe sobai jane. eto r mahanogorir flat e boro hoya bortoman projonmo noy!!! 600 ekar jomir malik ra rajyo sarkarer deoya khotipurone khushi. aabar eibhabeo bola jaye, tara durodorshi, tara prathomik swarthotyag korte pereche. tader obhinandon. tader barir ekjon TATA der karkhanaye chakri pabe, bina poyeshate proshikkhon pabe. ete tara khushi. tachara khotipuroner taka to ache. kintu anicchuk krishok? tader tahole ki bolbo? sreni-shotru?? desher unnoti bojhe na? naki birodhi doler bhul bojhani te pa dicche? tader dosh konta? desher katha keno bhabbe se? desh take ki diyeche? desher katha je bhabte hoy, ei bodh tai dite byertho hoyeche tar desh!!!

era sab jomir malik, tai aj jomihara. r jara konodin nijer jomi ki jinish jane na, tader tahole ki obostha? prothome bola hoy( sept'2006) khet mojurder 5 bochorer mojurir taka deoya hobe khotipuron hisebe. tarpor bochor ghurtei khotipuroner khata theke khet mojurder nam muche jaye!! aj jokhon tara Nano karkhanar gate er baire bose andolon korche tokhon porithiti samal diye mahakaron theke bola hocche tader 300 diner mojuri deoya sombhab hobe!!!!!! 5 bhochor hoye gelo 300 din? era pothe namle amader office theke bari phirte deri hoy! amra gaal di. kintu era pothe nambe na????

Economic review te dekha jacche TATA ra Singure dhokar pore sekhankar jomir dam ager cheye 15 gun bere geche! tahole chashira keno ajker dam pabe na? Rajyo sarkar dekhbe na tader dik ta? tara na a rajyer etodiner voter? manusher katha na hoy nai na bhabben, 'voter'der katha to bhabun!

poristhiti jotil theke jotilotoro..........r aj bodhhoy haater baire. gora-tei je eto eto golod! amra eto eto taka tax bhori. sei taka thekei to khotipuron-turon deoya hoy bole shunechi...mane jodi taka kom pore. tahole noy aro kichu beshie bhorlam. krishok der antoto 25 theke 30 lakh taka deoya uchit chilo! eta ami noy anek boro boro orthonitibid rai bolchen, jate kore jara ajo krishi kaj korte ecchuk tara rajyer onyotro bhalo jomi kine chole jete parto. krishi chara to kono desh chole na ,tai krishok er somajik status na barleo desher onoggol hoto na kicchu!! khotipuron er sathe sathe puronbashon o joruri chilo je dik ta grajyoi korlo na rajyo sarkar!! eta sarkar er byerthota! nijer bhul jor golaye swikar korte parche na bolei aj jokhon Durgapur exp way 8 din dhore bodho korar moto oporadhjonok kaj hocche WB e, tokhon protibad korte parche na sarkar khola golaye!!! a ek odbhut obostha amader rajye! ekdike birodhi doler dishahin paglami, onyodike bhul-sorbosyo sarkari neeti, jar chokrobyuhe phnese ache Singur er jomi akre thaka andolankari manush, aabar amader moto mahanogorir manush-o, jara unnoyon chaye karon tader ruji rojkar nirbhor korche sei unnoyan er opor!

TATA ra phirbe kina jani na. Sarkari neeti poribonton hobe kina jani na. kintu je-ii sarkare thakuk na keno Singur Nandigram theke shikkha niye su-porikolpito bhabe, darkar porle netara nijeder buddhi folano ta bondho kore nijo nijo filed e scholar anek Bangali economist achen tader poramarsho niye bhobishyote kono project korun.

Jaane Tu....Ya Jaane Na

Cast: Imran Khan, Genelia Dâ€™souza, Ratna Pathak Shah

Director: Abbas Tyrewala

Ei cinema ta niye Aamir Khan last 3 months dhore je poriman publicity te basto hoye porechilo, aamir nijer kono cinema niye koreche ba in future korbe kina sondeho ache!

Obosso taro ekta karon ami khuje peyechi, Jaane Tu... te lokyo korle dekha jabe star cast khub ekta bhari-barakkom noy, Genelia South er naami heroin hote pare, bollywood e ekhono porjonto one cinema old! Misti mukh, tobu Dipika Padugan er motono 'Mumbai girl' ba ramp theke uthe asha glamour doll noy! Imran ke bhishon sundor dekhte,kintu se 'good dancer' ba 'He-man' marka body-wala noy! ekhon bollywood e entry pabar jonne sudhu star-purta/konya holei chole na, sathe sathe oi gungulo keo ayotte ana chai.Chocolate hero der jug chole geche!kintu....., ekhanei ekta boro 'kintu' theke jacche! R setar jonnei Aamir er naoya khaoya bhule 'bhagne' r [Aamir's sister's son is Imran] ei uthe pore laga!

Jaane Tu..Ya Jaane Na...sommondhe ekta katha bolte gele bola jete pare, 'Old wine in a new bottle'... QSQT banale 2008 er youth just nito na, KKHH banaleo problem chilo, seta story nito ki nito na thekeo boro, 'Two Khan's Problem', tobe bondhutto/friendship....ei concept er opor golpo to juge juge dorshok gile neye!ekhaneo nayok nayikar 'platonic friendship for love'---- purono wine shunechi khete aro bhalo lage!!! Fresh chehara, Imran-Genelia r ekta fresh juti...eigulo dorshok gile nilo. Sathe A R Rahman er music ei chobi te ekdom refreshing lage. chobir mood er sathe ja dorshok ke barti anando deye.

Story chotto kore bole di. Jai r Aditi best friend, eki college porto! college er sesh din oder baba ma rao bhebe bosechilo tader chele meye 'committed', biyer katha jokhon Aditi r baba ma parlem Jai er kache, Aditi r samne tokhon dujonei bishon khaye! Karon tara bhabeoni kokhono tara 'couple' , tara best friend er beshi kichui noi, eta bolei tara baba ma, jogot sansar o nijeder convince koraye! erpor Aditi o aro bondhu ra Jai er jonne 'girl friend' khuje deye!Aditi-o babar bondhur cheler sathe 'engaged' hoye jaye!

Kintu ek somoy dujonei bujhte pare, tader partner selection ta motei thik hoyeni. tarpor ki holo seta r bolchi na , na Aamir tar prothom cinema te more giye amake/ amaderke boddo khadiyechilo, 2008 er jonota ke khadale mushkil ache, tai directer o sei risk nite channi! Asole barbar bollywood er purono 'love story' gulor sathe keno compare korchi 'Jaane Tu...' er ?? eta sei typical Love Story noy! tobe hya, kichu exceptional o noy!

Acting sobai khub bhalo koreche. Specially Imran. Prothom cinema mone hoyeni. besh Spontaneous acting. R sundor dekhte. Aamir Khan er sathe katha bolaye besh mil o pelam. sobcheye bhalo laglo khub natural acting, ektuo atirikto kichu korte jayeni[ei prosongge amar kichudin agei ek star putra r aabirbhaber cinema tar katha mone porlo, Ranvir Kapoor.....cinema ta to churanto flop chiloi , sei songge Ranvir er otirongito obhinoy...ufff horrible !] Bondhu gulor acting bhalo lage. Bisesh kore Jignes(h) name ek Gujju bondhu chilo, typical gujju accent e katha boleche. R ekta chotto role Aditir bhai amit, Smita Patil er chele koreche, darun acting korlo.

Jai-er Mayer role Ratna Pathak Shah just onobodyo! chobi theke katha bola 2/3 bar Nassiruddhin Shah[Jai er Rajput mrito baba] er mojar choritro tao darun.

Sobcheye bhalo legeche konta? Apart from Imran er innocent sundor mukh ta, Ghoda chutiye mumbai er rastaye majh rate girl frnd te atkate jaoya..... 'Pappu can't dance sala' gaan ta.....darun!

Jara Akkay/Paresh er commedy, Abhi r serious face, Kareena size- zero, Katrina r joghonyo acting dheke bore, fed up hoye gecho, tara obossoi Jaane Tu...Jaane Na dekho, ektu refreshing lagbe.

Chronicles of Narnia-Prince Caspian

Chronicles of Narnia-Prince Caspian' sottie bhishon sundor film. C. S. Lewis-er bikhyato "Seven Chronicles of Narnia'' stories theke neoya - 'The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe', tarpor 'Prince Caspian'...ei duto golpo er opor 'Walt Disney Pictures' film toiri koreche ekhono porjonto.

Kolponik holeo bhishon rongin ek duniya, magical fantasy land r bhishon bhabe bastob hoye utheche 'Greco-Roman mythology', katha-bola chotuspod, hante cholte para brikkho (talking mammals, tree spirits), fauns, minotaurs, gryphons, khude manush, jader amra 'bamon' boli, snow witch , magic - sobi mojut ache ekhane; Narnia r duniya te.

Peter,Susan, Edmund r Lucy--ei char kishor kishorir golpo.'The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe' jara dekheche, tara ei char khude ke cheno. Ei chobi te tara England er ekta school e pore, ekdin school e jabar pothe subway te opekkha korchilo, hathat jhor othe, tarpor staion er pathorer deoyal theke pathor khose pore, tara pouche jaye sei magical fantasy land e. Ei charjon chele meyei kintu hajar bochor age Narnia r duniyar basinda chilo, shudhu basindhai noy Peter chilo King! tader sobar sorir diyei boichilo raj poribarer rokto.

Kibhabe tader Prince Caspian er sathe dekha holo, tarpor Narnia r opor je bipod ghoniye ashechilo, ei char kishor kishori r Prince Caspian ki bhabe Narnia r basindha der bachalo ei niyei golpo egiye chole tan tan uttejonaye. Lucy r adorer anugami Aslan namer Lion tir aabar dekha paoya jabe ebareo.

Chotoder khub bhalo lagbe. Amar mote sab boyesher manusheri bhalo lagbe chobita, biseshesoto ei jantik jibon chere arai-tin gontar jonne ekta magical world e chole jabar emon sujog ke-i ba charte chaibe!. Over all it was a happy treat for me.

Bombay

Cinema ta jotobar dekhi toto jeno aagamibar dekhar nesha probol bere jaye! Kaal jemon TV-r channel ghorate ghorate chokh atke gelo. Manisha Koirala sei odbhut ankora soundarjye, ja eksomoy bollywood er somosamoyik leading-lady der theke kichu ta alada kore diyechilo ei Nepali sundari ke.Sab kichu ke chhapiye jaye obosso A.R.Rehman er onobodyo music! Kimba Roja-r safolyer por national audience er chahida purone eksho shotangsho sofol porichalok Mani Ratnam er story, screenplay o direction!

1995 e phire gele dekha jabe tokhon kintu eto experimental hindi chobi toiri hoto na! chilo sei "thor bodi khara, khara bodi thor"! pNan-pNane love story ba action films. 1992 te 'Roja' mukti paye, sei bochore aro duti chobi nojore porar moto[box office success bolchi na] ,se gulo holo 'Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar' r 'Raju Ban Gaya Gentleman'. Ei somoy ta bollywood e tin KHAN er rajotyo chilo! Box Office Hit eker por ek cinema proti shukrobar bharotiyo jotota gilto! 1994 te Vidhu Vinod Chopra typical romance, action theke sore ashe banalen '1942-A Love Story'! Tobe puropuri ki sofol hote parlen? amar mone hoy na.Ei film ta beshi jonopriyota pelo probad protim surokar R.D.Barman er bollywood e sesh osamanyo sristir jonne!

Jaihok , ami ekdom onyodike chole jacchi bodh kori...

Phire ashi 'Bombay' er kathaye. Je bochore Bombay mukti pelo, Se bochor bollywood er r ek mile stone cinema DDLJ mukti peyechilo, tobe bochorer sesher dike. Adyopranto Social Cinema jodi boli tahole 'Roja'-r por nam korte hoy 'Bombay' r.

Babri Masjid dhongso-leela sesh, Arab sagar diye anek jol-o boye geche . Oboseshe ekta film e phute uthlo tar kichu khondo chitro!

Shekhar (Arvind Swamy) ar Sheila Banu (Manisha Koirala)-r golpo pordaye phute utheche ekdom bastob chitro rupe! Ekhon bollywood e proti bochorei ei dhoroner du-ekta experimental cinema toiri hoy boiki, jate desh prem er melodrama nei. cinemar hero r choritro 'larger than life' noy. Tobe sei trend ta bollywood e sofol bhabe set kore gechen Mani Ratnam.Eker por ek Roja, Bombay, Dilse, Yuva r moto cinema toiri kore! Haalfiler 'Lagaan' ba "Rang De Basanti' 'Parzania' tari bastob rup!

Kottor Hindu poribar er chele Shekhar preme porlo tar grameri Muslim meye Sheila Banu-r.barir omote biye kore chole elo swapno nagori Bombay te, nijeder ghor badhar swapno ke sofol korbe bole. Newspaper agency r proof reader-er chakri millo Shekhar er. Kintu tader pechon charlo na tader jonmo-sutre paoya 'jaat'! ermodhye ghote geche aadhunik bharoter sobcheye kolonkito adhyaye Babri Masjid dhongso, ja bohu jug dhore chole asha Hindu-Muslim bibhed ke sobcheye boro dhakkha diyeche. Bharater je sohor ke sobcheye beshi khotipuron dite hoyeche tar, tar nam BOMBAY! Shekhar ar Banu sei peerito, khotigrosto jono-somprodayer protinidhi. Ek Hindu cheler Muslim meyer sathe premer golpo jeno rupoker moto sorbo-kalin dorshok ke nara diye gelo, nara diye jabe...!

Cinemar sesh ek gonta jeno dekha jaye na, chokher jol phelte badhyo hoben chorom abeghin manush-o! Manishar obhinoy sobaike chhapiye jay! ei cinema ta proman kore koto boro maper obhinetri chilo Manisha! 'chilo' bollam karon Manisha nijer protibhar proti justice koreni! jaihok, Shekhar ar Banu tader dui chele ke hariye phele Communal danggaye.Kamal ar Kabir...tara Hindu na Muslim? sei muhurte tader sobcheye boro porichoy hoye daralo, Hindu baba o Muslim mayer santan Kamal o Kabir er 'Indian' porichoy! Se ek odbhut drishyo! chokher polok phelar upai nei sesh somoy taye! Obosso porichalok dorshokder anek chokher jol phelaleo, sei chokher jolei aabar milon ghotaye ekta 'bharotiyo poribarer' sokol sodhyer! sesh drishyer purotatei aboho sanggit te beje choleche A R Rehman er sei 'Bombay theme' .

Sab miliye 'Bambay' cinema ta Indian cinema r bhandare ek utkristo sompod. je cinema ta kokhono purono hobe na, ki tar porichalona, tar sanggit, sorbopori obhinoy! Ek kalangkito bastab ke eto utkorser sathe cinemar canvas e chittrito korar jonne ei cinemar somosto kala-kusholi ke barongbar dhonyobad janai.

P.S. Lekhar por mone holo ekta boro bhul kore phelechi, asole bollywood boddhoy raghob boyal er moto regional cinema ke gras kore. Bombay cinema ti prothom Tamil bhashatei toiri hoy, infact Hindi te tar dubbing kora hoy. erpor Telugu teo cinema ti dubbing hoyeche.

A Tribute To Satyajit Ray

Apu-r Katha..

Saal ta 1992. Ekattor bochorer ek kormojogee'r dheerghyo bornonoy jiboner shika praye nibhu nibhu. Mrityu sojjaye sayito royechen tini, othocho tokhoni pashchatyo totha sara biswa tNake niye, tNar sristi ke niye unmadito, bismito o shihorito.Academy Award nite protham ebong ekhono porjonto ekmatro bharotiyo sedin manche uposthit thakte parenni thiki, kintu sedin biswa chalachitra-jogoter sorboccho asore sobar hRidye chiro-ason pete niyechilen Sree Satyajit Ray. Tini e amake Apu'r moto ek ononto jiggasha-moy jogote protham probesh koriyechilen. Tini e shikhiyechen cinema manei obhineta obhinetri der poshak -ashak dekha ar obeg e knede bharasho noy, cinema ekta chobi aNakar canvas er motoi, cinema holo shilpir sorbottom kolpona, cinema ekta jibon-aalekkhyo! Tobe sudhu chalachitrakar hisebei Satyajit Ray'r kaj ke seemito korle bhul hobe. Tini Sahityik, tini chitro-shilpi, sangeet-boddha, sorbopori ekjon bishal maaper manush.Sree Upendrakishore Ray (Roychowdhury)'r nati, Sukumar Ray 'r chele Satyajit banglar ek oti protibhashali poribarer protinidhi. ekatha amra sobai jani. kintu anekei jeta jani na seta holo, Satyajit Ray'er jonmer pore porei Sukumar Ray prochondo asustho hoye poren.Thakur-da ke jonmer agei hariyechilo Satyajit. Baba keo se beshidin payeni. Babar mrityur tin bochorer modhye poittrik byebsha o bhite chere mayer haat dhore Satyajit mamar bari chole ashe. Tokhon tnar ma selai karjo kore sansar kharoch chalaten!! Sutarong 'sonar chamoch mukhe diye' Satyajit er chelebela kateni. Jara Satyajit er "Jokhon choto chilam" boi ta porecho, tara nischoi pore thakbe tNar chelebelar kichu kichu katha.

School jibone ebong aro joralo bhabe college jibone , Stayajit ke cinema'r maayajaal aasthe- pristhe joriye dhore. Presidency College Science o Economics niye porte dhukleo Satyajit er mon pore thakto Ernst Lubitsch, John Ford, Frank Capra, William Wyler 'der niyei.Sei somoy thekei Western music take akristho kore. Academic career chere beriye ashen Satyajit, commercial artist hobar porikolpona koren,tader poribare tokhon takar etotai darkar chilo.

1940 saale Satyajit Vishwa-Bharati Viswabidyalaya, Shantiniketan e jogdan koren. Kolkata sohorer chele Satyajit gram banglar matir kacha kachi pouche jan ei prothom. Poroborti kale sei drishyo dhora poreche tar camerar lens e.Tobe Satyajit er Shantiniketan er jibon beshidiner chilo na. 1941 e Rabindranath Thakur(Satyajit er thakur'dar ghonistho bondhu chilen)-er mrityu ghote.Shantiniketan er badhadhora jiboner majhe Satyajit-er mon Kolkata tatha nagor-jibon,tar ma,tar priya Bijoya (Bijoya tNar mamato bon chilen), tar jokhon tokhon cinema dekhte jaoyar swadhinota, gan shona...ei sab kichur jonnei byekul hoye othe. 1942 e Japan jedin Kolkataye protham boma phele sedin-i Satyajit Kolkata phire ashen. tobe oi du-bochore kichudin Rabi-Thakurer sannidhyo, Binode Behari Mukherjee'r moto shikkhok er kache Bharatiyo Chitra-shipler path neoya,German Jew,ek English er adhyapoker sathe pashchya Sangeet o Cinema' r alochona, sorbopori gram banglar matir kole katano ei duti bochor Satyajit ke poroborti kaale ek dokkho shilpi rupe jogoter kache toiri kore diyechilo.

1943 theke 1950 ei somoy ta Satyajit Graphic Designer o Typographer hisebe kaj korten. 1955 te Pather Panchali chobi ti sompurno hobar porei tini ei kaj chere sorbo-somoyer jonne(full-time) chitra-porichalok hisebe kaj suru koren.

1949 saale Jean Renoir Kolkataye ashen 'The River' chobir shooting korte. Satyajit Renoir sathe dekha koren o take chobir location nirbachone sahajyo koren. tobe 'The River' er shooting kaale Satyajit deshe chilen na, kaje gechilen London e. 16 diner jolpothe London sofore tini ekti note-boi te likhte thaken Pather Panchali'r pandulipi.London-e 6 mash thaka kalin anek cinema dekhen Ray. Tarmodhye sobcheye probhabito hoyechilen Vittorio De Sica'er Bicycle Thieve dekhe. Poroborti kaale 'Our Films, Their Films', boi-tite tini likhechilen- "All through my stay in London, the lessons of Bicycle Thieves and neo-realist cinema stayed with me".

Apu-r poth chola holo suru....

Pather Panchalir jonne kono producer khuje panni tini. Prothome hothash hoyechilen tobuo tini shooting suru korlen.27 October 1952, Apu-Durga'r sei bikhyeto "discovery of train by Apu and his sister Durga in the field of Kaash flowers" drishyotir bastab rup-dan koren Satyajit Ray. Tar jiboner prothom shot, tNake itihasher pataye stan kore diyechilo sedin! 1955 saale sab protikulata ke joy kore Kaalo-joyee Cinema 'Pather Panchali' mukti pelo. Cinemar jotote jonmo ghotlo ek notun debotar(camera haate Debotai chilen tini).

Tarpor poreo anek badha bipotti asheche Satyajit Ray er jibone.Tnar prapyo somman tini arjon korechilen anek pore. Amra take kador korechi tnar jiboner antim logne.Majhe majhe mone hoy Satyajit Ray jodi sudhu Sahiyik hoten, taholeo tNake amra mone rakhtam, etotai bolistho chilo tar lekha. Phelu-da ba Professor Sanku, kimba tNar sristi bibhinno golper choritrogulo.... 'Khagam' 'Anukul', 'Mriganka Babu' era sobai anache kanache lukiye ache amar chelebelar.Ekhono tototai tortaja lage boigulo porte bosle.

Pather Panchali theke Agantuk.....eibhabei ami dekhi Satyajit Ray -ke. Apu rupe Satyajit ashechilo Bangalir ghore ghore, majher somoy ta te choto Apu boro holo ebong biswa joy korlo. Angantuk 'er Manomohan Mitra, seo to Satyajit Ray nijei.... jini 'Nemo', mane 'no one'. kintu sobai ke kadiye ebong anek kichu shikhiye jini chole gelen................!!

Khuda Kay Liye

Starring:Shaan, Fawad Khan, Iman Ali, Rasheed Naaz and Naseeruddin Shah

Director :Shoaib Mansoor

'Khuda Kay Liye' dekhlam porshudin.Pakistani film holeo bujhte ba dekte kono asubidha hoyni.karon mone holo flim ta internatinal viewer der katha mathaye rekhei banano hoyeche.

Khuda Kay Liye..naam ta sunei bojha jacche er sathe religion jorito. muloto Islam ba muslim somajer golpo. r kono mandhartar amoler noy,khod ei juger(post 9/11) potobhumikaye golpo ta!film tar story line tai eto strong je obhinoy kichu kichu jayega te chora daager holeo chokhe pore na!

story ta alpoi bolbo, tahole dekhar interest thakbe. dui bhai er golpo. Mansoor r Sarmad, jara Pakisthan er Lahore'r jothesto rich o broadminded,liberal family'r chele, jara music bhalobashe ebong seta kei aNkre dhore bNachte chaye!

sei eki family'r r ek chele(je Mansoor o Sarmad er kaka) bohudin agei desh chere UK te pari deye. sekhanei tar family te nana bhanga gora cholte thake. tar konya ti, Mary, se ek British Asian , preme pore ek British er!

Sarmad tar ek bondhur sathe ekdin eshe pore ek kottor maulvi -r kache! se Islam ke jotobhabe para jaye bikrito kore Sarmad ke bhul pothe porichalito kore, music onto-pran Sarmad 'Islam-birodhi kaj' music chere daye, tar dada, baba make otobak kore...!!sompurno bodle jaye tar lifestyle! koto ta bodle jaye seta r bolchi na...!

Mary'r baba mone mone kichutei mene nite pare na meyer ei 'Islam-birodhi kaj'!! se nije British girl-friend ke niye eki chaader tolaye thake, kintu meye jodi Islamer baire nika kore tahole tar je jahannume thNai hobe!!! 30 bochor UK te thekeo se morar pore nijer rasta poriskar korte chaye...!! se ki korlo tahole? seta janar jonne cinema ta dekhte hobe...

Mansoor er golpo ta khub koster. se music niye porte USA pari daye! kintu tar pechon pechon je haana dite pare '9/11' er kalo chaya...se gunakkoreo bujhte pare na. jokhon tar gyan holo. totokkhone anektai deri hoye geche...!

Islamer sobtai ki tahole kharap? porichalok anek -ve dik dekhiyeo cinemar climax e Maulana Wali (Naseeruddin Shah)'r mukh diye je sar-ongsho ta boliyechen setai cinema ta theke beriye asha mul message!

anekdin por ekta bhalo cinema dekhe besh khushi holam. ar ekta katha ei film ta 'world hit' tokma peyeche. r anek bideshi film festival e besh jwor tuleche. obhinoy ba film making er technical part gulo chere sudhu matro story line r sahoshi boktobyo- er jonnei film ta eto sara pheleche.

TAARE ZAMEEN PAR

Indian Cinema te ei dhoroner topic khub beshi chokhe pore na, antoto main stream cinema te. Aamir Khan tar directorial debut te aro ekbar proman korlo je se bollywood er mashala movie-maker der theke ektu 'haatke'! er age 'BLACK' cinema ta dekhe sobai ebhabe kNedechilo bodhhoy! kintu TZP takeo kichu ta mat diye deye, karon ekhane kono nami daami STAR abhineta nei, emon ki Aamir Khan nije je role ta play koreche, tar entry holo 2nd half e. eka sorbokkhon matiye rekhechilo 9 bochorer khude ISHAN!Darsheel Safary,cheleta adbhut sundor acting korlo! or pashe Aamir Khan keo boro star mone hoyeni. puro cinematar modhye jeno chilo ekta magic! Aamir ekdom protham theke, mane nam dekhano thekei dorshok ke ekta magical world e niye chole jaye! sekhane amader porichoy hoye Ishaner sathe. Ishan r panchta bacchar moto noy, 3rd standard e fail koreo tar shikkha holo na dekhe tar baba take pathiye dilo broading school. Ishan sobsomoy ekta kolponar jogote bichoron kore! Alphabets, numbers sab tar chokher samne neche beray!schooler porikkhate fail kore bote,tobe colour pencil haate niye adbhut sundor chobi aNke. kintu baba ma, schooler teacher, para protibeshi keo tar moner khoj nite pare na!sobai chotto Ishan ke obogya kore, take "dafar'' bole, mardhor-o kore! ekmatra tar ma r dada take banchate ashe. kintu baba r katha moto broading school jaoya bondho korte pare na ! erpor ki holo seta cinema ta sobai nijera dekhei jene nio. ami erbeshi golpo ta bolbo na! Box office abosso onno katha-o bolte pare, karon sekhane munafar mapkathite movie r gradation toiri hobe! Om Shanti Om box office megahit tokma pete cholche 2007 e! Tobu bolchi, TZP ekta adbhut sundor cinema, sobai dekho! na dekhle life r ekta boro shikkha, jeta manush hoyeto anek anek din pore giye realize kore, seta pabe na! protiti manusher modhye kichu na kichu special jinish thake,amrader jibon INSTITUTION kendrik, amra chele meyeder Doctor, Engineer, MBA professional chara onno kichu banate chaina! chotto baccha ta ke diye ma baba tader moner opurnno asha-akangkha metate chaye! kintu sei bacchatar moner khabor nite pare na! emonki choto Ishan dyslexia name ek roger sikar jene tar baba nijeder okkhomota dakte chesta kore chele ke sahajyo korte egiye na eshe!! eibhabe Ishan hoye pore khub eka!* *sobai class e 1st hoye na, sobai porashona, khela dhulaye Champion hote pare na!! kintu sab sishui special, je chobi aNkte bhalobashe take sei kaje badha na diye borong seta kei encourage kora uchit. school er porikkhaye take to pass marks pelei holo! kintu ta na kore sishu mon ke adbhut ek 'rat race' e baba ma bhiriye dite chaye! r sei race pa horke gele baccha ta ke sobai mile opoman kore! eibhabe tar modhye jonmo neye honyomonnota bodh! tar confidence level ta tor tor kore neme ekebare tolani te giye theke.
